	[] -> CSS
	[{}] -> style

	/*==============================================
	=            BLOGGER STYLE VARIABLE            =
	==============================================*/

	<Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#E4EBEE" value="#E4EBEE"/>

	<Group description="Body" selector="body">
		<Variable name="body.background.color" description="Body Background Color" type="color" default="#E4EBEE" value="#E4EBEE"/>
	</Group>
	<Variable name="body.background" description="Body Background" type="background" color="$(body.background.color)" default="$(color) none no-repeat fixed center center" value="$(color) none no-repeat fixed center center"/>		

	<Group description="Text Color" selector="body">
		<Variable name="body.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#545454" value="#545454"/>
	</Group>

	<Group description="Links Color" selector="body">
		<Variable name="link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#1a0dab" value="#1a0dab"/>
		<Variable name="link.visited.color" description="Visited Color" type="color" default="#609" value="#660099"/>
	</Group>

	<Group description="Border Color" selector="body">
		<Variable name="all.border.color" description="Border Color" type="color" default="#EBEBEB" value="#EBEBEB"/>
		<Variable name="all.border.before.color" description="Border Before Color" type="color" default="#4285f4" value="#4285f4"/>
	</Group>	

	<Group description="Header" selector="#header">
		<Variable name="header.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>	
		<Variable name="header.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#4285f4" value="#4285f4"/>			
		<Variable name="header.button.color" description="Button Color" type="color" default="#545454" value="#545454"/>	
		<Variable name="header.border.color" description="Border Color" type="color" default="#ebebeb" value="#ebebeb"/>					
	</Group>	

	<Group description="Navigation" selector="#sidedrawer">
		<Variable name="navigation.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
		<Variable name="navigation.link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#545454" value="#545454"/>		
		<Variable name="navigation.border.color" description="Border Color" type="color" default="#ebebeb" value="#ebebeb"/>
		<Variable name="navigation.link.hover.background" description="Link Hover Background" type="color" default="#4285f4" value="#4285f4"/>	
		<Variable name="navigation.link.hover.color" description="Link Hover Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>		
	</Group>

	<Group description="Article" selector="#content-wrapper">
		<Variable name="article.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#FFFFFF" value="#FFFFFF"/>
		<Variable name="article.title.color" description="Title Color" type="color" default="#545454" value="#545454"/>	
		<Variable name="article.border.color" description="Border Color" type="color" default="#EBEBEB" value="#EBEBEB"/>
	</Group>	

	<Group description="Article Label" selector="#content-wrapper">
		<Variable name="article.label.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#4285f4" value="#4285f4"/>
		<Variable name="article.label.link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>			
	</Group>					

	<Group description="Footer Widget" selector=".website-footer-widget">
		<Variable name="footer.widget.background.color" description="Background" type="color" default="#FFFFFF" value="#FFFFFF"/>
		<Variable name="footer.widget.border.color" description="Border Top Color" type="color" default="#EBEBEB" value="#e4e4e4"/>
		<Variable name="footer.widget.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#545454" value="#545454"/>	
		<Variable name="footer.widget.link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#1a0dab" value="#1a0dab"/>				
	</Group>
	<Group description="Footer Copyright" selector=".footer-copyright">
		<Variable name="footer.copyright.background.color" description="Background" type="color" default="#FFFFFF" value="#FFFFFF"/>
		<Variable name="footer.copyright.border.color" description="Border Top Color" type="color" default="#EBEBEB" value="#EBEBEB"/>		
		<Variable name="footer.copyright.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#545454" value="#545454"/>
		<Variable name="footer.copyright.link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#1a0dab" value="#1a0dab"/>		
	</Group>					

	/*=====  End of BLOGGER STYLE VARIABLE  ======*/

	/*==============================================
	=            BLOGGER LAYOUT & COLOR            =
	==============================================*/

	/* LAYOUT */
	layout {padding:50px}
	body#layout {max-width:100%;}
	#layout{min-width:0}	
	#layout #sidedrawer{position:static;width:50%;float:left}
	#layout #sidedrawer li{display:none}
	#layout #ButtonHeader{}
	#layout #header-site {display:none}
	#layout #header{position:static;float:right;width:50%}
	#layout #main-sidebar{float:right;width:45%}
	#layout #main-wrapper{float:left;width:45%}
	#layout #AdsMain{overflow:hidden;width:auto%;clear:both;margin:10px auto}
	#layout #footer{clear:both;overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:20px;}
	#layout #website-footer{clear:both;width:auto}
	#layout #PluginExternalBottom{clear:both}

	/* COLOR */
	body{background:$(body.background);color:$(body.text.color);}
	a:link{color:$(link.color);}
	a:visited{color:$(link.visited.color);}

	/* HEADER */
	#header{background:$(header.background.color)!important;border-color:$(header.border.color)!important;}
	#header h1.title,#header h1.title a{color:$(header.text.color)!important;}
	#ButtonHeader button,.sidedrawer-toggle{color:$(header.button.color)!important;}

	/* NAVIGATION */
	#sidedrawer{background:$(navigation.background.color)!important;border-color:$(navigation.border.color)!important;}
	#sidedrawer a.block,#sidedrawer strong{color:$(navigation.link.color)!important;}
	#sidedrawer a.block:hover,#sidedrawer a.block:focus,#sidedrawer a.active,#sidedrawer strong:hover,#sidedrawer strong:active{background:$(navigation.link.hover.background) !important;color:$(navigation.link.hover.color) !important}

	/* ARTICLE */	
	.blog-posts .post-title,.post-info,#SidebarWidget .widget-content,.blog-posts .post-content,#related-post,.post-author-profile,#comments,#SidebarWidget .widget,.post-content-single{background:$(article.background.color)!important;border-color:$(article.border.color)!important;}
	.blog-posts .post-title-index,.blog-posts .post-title-index a,#SidebarWidget .widget h3.title,#related-post h3,.post-author-profile h3,#comments h3{color:$(article.title.color)!important;}
	.blog-posts .post-title-index,.blog-posts .post-footer-snippet{border-color:$(article.border.color)!important;}
	/* ARTICLE LABEL */
	.mui-btn--raised,a.mui-btn--raised,.post-label-snippet-grid,.post-content .comment-link-grid {
	background:$(article.label.background.color) !important;
	}
	.mui-btn--raised,a.mui-btn--raised,.post-content .comment-link-grid, .post-label-snippet-grid a {
	color:$(article.label.link.color) !important;
	}	

	/* FOOTER WIDGET COLOR */	
	.website-footer-widget{background-color:$(footer.widget.background.color)!important;color:$(footer.widget.text.color)!important;border-color:$(footer.widget.border.color)!important;}
	.website-footer-widget a{color:$(footer.widget.link.color)!important;}

	/* FOOTER COPYRIGHT */	
	.footer-copyright{background-color:$(footer.copyright.background.color)!important;border-color:$(footer.copyright.border.color)!important;color:$(footer.copyright.text.color)!important;}
	.footer-copyright a{color:$(footer.copyright.link.color)!important;}

	/* BORDER BEFORE */	
	.blog-posts .post-title-index,.website-footer .widget h3.title,#comments h3,.post-author-profile h3,#related-post h3,#SidebarWidget .widget h3.title,#blog-pager-container .pager-border{border-color:$(all.border.color)!important;}
	.blog-posts .post-title-index:before,.website-footer .widget h3.title:before,#comments h3:before,.post-author-profile h3:before,#related-post h3:before,#SidebarWidget .widget h3.title:before,#blog-pager-container .pager-border:before{background-color:$(all.border.before.color)!important;}

	/*=====  End of BLOGGER LAYOUT & COLOR  ======*/

					.blog-posts .post-thumbnail{height:150px;overflow:hidden;}

		display: block;

		blockquote:before {

	function del_url_parm(alamatnya) {var oldURL = alamatnya; var index = 0; var newURL = oldURL; index = oldURL.indexOf('?'); if (index == -1) {index = oldURL.indexOf('#'); } if (index != -1) {newURL = oldURL.substring(0, index); } return newURL; }

			//
			function check_element(elementid) {
			return document.getElementById(elementid) ? 1 : 0;
			}
			function insertAfterBefore(element, target, setting) {
			var moveto = target.parentNode;
			if (setting == "after") {		
			moveto.insertBefore(element, target.nextSibling)		
			}if (setting == "before") {
			moveto.insertBefore(element, target)		
			}
			}
			function targetmove(set, tag, numtag, element,target,optional) {
			if (!check_element(element)) {return false};
			var moveto = document.getElementById(target), 
			selecttag = moveto.getElementsByTagName(tag),
			elementmove = document.getElementById(element);
			if (numtag == 0 || selecttag.length < 0 || selecttag.length < numtag) {
			moveto.insertAdjacentElement(optional,elementmove);
			return false;
			};
			numtag = numtag-1;
			insertAfterBefore(elementmove, selecttag[numtag], set);
			}

				function createCookie(name,value,days) {
				if (days) {
				var date = new Date();
				date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
				var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
				}
				else var expires = "";
				document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
				}
				function readCookie(name) {
				var nameEQ = name + "=";
				var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
				for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
				var c = ca[i];
				while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
				if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
				}
				return null;
				}
				function eraseCookie(name) {
				createCookie(name,"",-1);
				}
				function setExpiryDate() {
				var d = new Date();
				d.setDate(d.getDate() + 1);
				return d.toGMTString();
				}						
				function createAcceptCookie() {
				if (readCookie("kodeinblogger_modal") == "hide") {											
				eraseCookie('kodeinblogger_modal');
				}else {
				createCookie('kodeinblogger_modal','hide',1);
				}
				}
